mapper.select: select c.mNo, c.cProductQty, c.cProductTypePay, c.cCheckinTime, c.cCheckin, c.cCheckout, c.cPickupPos, c.cDropoffPos, c.cOrderCnt, c.pNo from cart c inner join product p on c.pNo = p.pNo and c.mNo = #{mNo} order by p.pType
mapper.insert: insert into cart (mNo, cProductQty, cProductTypePay, cCheckinTime, cCheckin, cCheckout, cPickupPos, cDropoffPos, cOrderCnt, pNo) values (#{mNo}, #{cProductQty}, #{cProductTypePay}, #{cCheckinTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCheckin}, #{cCheckout, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cPickupPos, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cDropoffPos, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cOrderCnt}, #{pNo})
